grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 狩猟期【シュリョウキ】hunting season
kun reading compounds: 狩る【かる】to hunt (animals), to search (for a criminal), to go looking for (flowers, etc.), to gather (mushrooms), to pick (berries)
狩り【かり】hunting, harvesting (e.g. berries, fruit), picking, gathering
狩場【かりば】hunting ground, hunting preserve
虫狩【むしかり】viburnum, Viburnum furcatum
